name: Sacrifarm
description:
Made in 72 hours for LD43/Jam in C on my own engine.

Keep the population alive! You play as a farmer who has to sacrifice people with his holy shotgun to please the rain gods for… well rain. The crops you grow feed the population, and your ultimate goal is to sustain it for as long as possible.

Best played with WASD and mouse, but arrows and space bar might work for you too.

Updates:

  • 12/4/2018 3:30 AM: Added fullscreen.
